sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-toolbar flat color="white" height="80px">
    <v-toolbar-side-icon></v-toolbar-side-icon>
    <v-toolbar-title class="header_title">ZhuHai Bus</v-toolbar-title>
    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
    <v-toolbar-items>
      <v-btn v-if="!show" icon @click="changeState">
        <v-icon>search</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
      <transition name="fade">
        <v-card class="header_search_bar" v-if="show">
          <v-btn icon>
            <v-icon>search</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
          <v-text-field class="search" lable="Search" single-line></v-text-field>
          <v-btn icon @click="changeState">
            <v-icon>close</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </v-card>
      </transition>
    </v-toolbar-items>
  </v-toolbar>
</template>
<script>
import { mapMutations } from "vuex";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      show: false,
      tabs: null,
      text:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat."
    };
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations(["changeState"])
  }
};
</script>
<style scoped>
@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Monoton|UnifrakturMaguntia");
/* font-family: 'Monoton', cursive; 标题字体
font-family: 'UnifrakturMaguntia', cursive; */
.header_search_bar {
  position: absolute;
  display: flex;
  top: 16px;
  left: 16px;
  right: 16px;
  height: 50px;
  z-index: 10;
}
.search {
}
.header_title {
  font-family: "Monoton", cursive;
  font-family: "UnifrakturMaguntia", cursive;
}

.fade-enter-active,
.fade-leave-active {
  transition: opacity 0.5s;
}
.fade-enter,
.fade-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
}
</style>
